name: Boogerman 20th Anniversary: The Video Game
blurb: Join us for a brand new HD Boogerman adventure made by the original creators, celebrating 20 years of excellent grossness!

rewards.reward: No Reward

THANK YOU!  YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS\r\n==============================\r\nThis reward tier will get you a spot in the backer credits of the final game as well as all updates and announcements related to the campaign!

EARLY BIRD! DIGITAL COPY OF BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY\r\n============================== \r\nYou early birds will get a code to download the final game on the platform of your choice; PC or MAC (DRM-free and possibly Steam), PS4, PS Vita, or Wii-U. All previous rewards included. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

DIGITAL COPY OF BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY ============================== We will send you a code to download the final game on the platform of your choice; PC or MAC (DRM-free and possibly Steam), PS4, PS Vita, or Wii-U. All previous rewards included. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

CO-OP MODE + PLAYABLE EARTHWORM JIM! + EXCLUSIVE LEVELS! ============================== \r\nTogether again for the first time since Clayfighter 63 1/3, Boogerman AND Earthworm Jim! This tier will get you a code to download Jim, co-op mode, and levels exclusive to this add-on! All previous non limited rewards included.

BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY DIGITAL ART BOOK\r\n============================== The digital art book will be available in PDF format (DRM-free) and will feature not only artwork from the 20th Anniversary version, but also some great stuff from the original game, including some never-before-seen pieces originally designed for Boogerman 2! All previous non limited rewards included. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK ============================== If you are a fan of the music from games like Banjo-Kazooie, Perfect Dark, Donkey Kong 64, Grabbed by the Ghoulies, and Kingdoms of Amalur, you are in luck! When the soundtrack is ready, we will send you information on where and how to download it! All previous non limited rewards included. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY BACKER FORUM ACCESS\r\n============================== Help shape the game! Gain access to the BM: 20th Anniversary Forums as well as the ability to participate in Backer-only polls and surveys. All previous non limited rewards included. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

CO-OP MODE + PLAYABLE EARTHWORM JIM! + EXCLUSIVE LEVELS + CO-OP T-SHIRT! ============================== \r\nTogether again for the first time since Clayfighter 63 1/3, Boogerman AND Earthworm Jim! This tier will get you a code to download Jim, co-op mode, levels exclusive to this add-on AND a T-SHIRT featuring both heroes in full color glory! GROOVY!

BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY VINYL STICKER SET\r\n============================== The set features six full color vinyl decals of some classic Boogerman characters, voted on by the backers. All previous non limited rewards included. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

PHYSICAL CD COPY OF BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY SOUNDTRACK ============================== Get your hands on a physical CD copy of the Boogerman 20th Anniversary Soundtrack by Grant Kirkhope. All previous non limited rewards included. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY BACKER T-SHIRT\r\n============================== We've got your back with this limited edition Boogerman 20th Anniversary backer exclusive T-Shirt. Available in standard cut or baby doll cut. All previous non limited  rewards included. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

BOOGERMAN 20th ANNVERSARY BACKER PATCH \r\n============================== Show your support old school style with this sweet embroidered Boogerman 20th Anniversary Backer Patch. All previous non limited  rewards included. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

SOFT COVER BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY PRINTED ART BOOK\r\n============================== This tier nets you a soft cover printed copy of the Boogerman 20th Anniversary Art Book. All previous non limited  rewards included. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

SIGNED HARD COVER BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY PRINTED ART BOOK ============================== Choosing this tier gets you a hard cover printed copy of the Boogerman 20th Anniversary Art Book signed by Team Boogerman. All previous non limited rewards included except for the soft cover art book. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

ORIGINAL ONE-OF-A-KIND BOOGERMAN ANIMATION ART\r\n============================== This tier includes a one of a kind animation drawing from the original Boogerman game created by the original Boogerman animators! These have never been offered before and once they are gone, they are gone. Includes all rewards from the "SIGNED HARD COVER BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY PRINTED ART BOOK" tier. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.) This tier includes 3 digital copies of the game on the platforms of your choice.

BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY RESIN STATUE (unpainted)\r\n============================== This tier delivers to you the unpainted 20th Anniversary Boogerman Statue, plus EVERY non-limited reward that we offer with the exception of the soft cover art book. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY RESIN STATUE (painted) ============================== This tier buys you the hand-painted 20th Anniversary Boogerman Statue, plus EVERY non-limited reward that we offer with the exception of the soft cover art book and the unpainted statue. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

YOUR FACE IN THE GAME\r\n============================== We'll make you famous by 2d-ifying your face and framing it on the walls of one of the bosses hidehouts like Hickboy's southern plantation home in the Flatulent Swamps or Boogermeister's residence in Puss Palace.  Includes all rewards from the "SIGNED HARD COVER BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY PRINTED ART BOOK" tier. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

ENEMY DESIGNER + DESIGNER CREDIT\r\n============================== Ever wanted to try your hand at game design? Well now you can! Work with the Boogerman team to design an enemy that suits one of the designated worlds, like Boogerville, The Mucous Mountains, The Nasal Carverns, and more. Includes a designer credit in the game! Includes all rewards from the "SIGNED HARD COVER BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY PRINTED ART BOOK" tier. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.) This tier includes 3 digital copies of the game on the platforms of your choice.

LIMITED EDITION NUMBERED GREEN CHROME BOOGERMAN CART WITH METAL COLLECTORS BOX\r\n============================== This killer reward is sure to be a classic collectable. Created exclusively for this campaign in VERY limited quantity, a numbered Green Chrome cartridge of the original game on the Genesis. Comes protected in a Metal Collectors Box. Includes all rewards from the "SIGNED HARD COVER BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY PRINTED ART BOOK" tier. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.) This tier includes 5 digital copies of the game on the platforms of your choice.

LIMITED EDITION NUMBERED GREEN CHROME BOOGERMAN 20th ANNIVERSARY RESIN STATUE + GREEN CHROME CART WITH METAL COLLECTORS BOX\r\n============================== Another disgustingly limited collectable, a numbered Green Chrome Boogerman 20th Anniversary statue. Includes all rewards from the "LIMITED EDITION NUMBERED GREEN CHROME BOOGERMAN CART WITH METAL COLLECTORS BOX" tier. (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.)

WRAP PARTY DINNER AT BARNEY'S BEANERY, PLUS EVERYTHING FROM THE 5k TIER! \r\n==============================\r\nYou and a friend will join the team at the original Barney's Beanery in West Hollywood CA for our Boogerman 20th Anniversary wrap party dinner! This is the same location the original wrap party dinner was held 20 years ago! Also includes everything from the 5k tier PLUS 5 additional digital copies of the game on the platforms of your choice!  (Refer to the rewards section of the page for more info.) Travel and accommodations not provided.
